alert.note: Alert for Blount; Knox; Sevier (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 4:56AM CDT until May 09 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM EDT FOR KNOX...NORTHWESTERN BLOUNT AND NORTHWESTERN SEVIER COUNTIES... At 555 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Knoxville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Knoxville, Maryville, Alcoa, Farragut, Louisville, Rockford, Eagleton Village, Halls, Kimberlin Heights and Lake Forest. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 372 and 405. Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 108 and 112. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
